title: New Apple TV Security Mount Released by Maclocks
text:

SOURCE Maclocks
Apple's new TV can no longer be hidden behind the monitor, so a secured display mounting option is needed.
AUSTIN, Texas , October 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Apple recently announced a complete overhaul of their Apple TV platform and all new taller dimensions. As is now customary, Kiosk manufacturer Maclocks is the first to introduce an Apple TV locking mount for the upgraded version.
A favorite of hospitality, education and enterprise settings nationwide, the new re-sized Apple TV is a cause for concern due to the lack of security and display options for the larger device. Maclocks realized the necessity in designing an Apple TV security mount that is scalable in size to secure the cube for a neat, clean and semi-hidden appearance.
The Apple TV security mount is the only mount on the market to offer a full security solution to the enhanced device and its input cables. Made of high-grade aluminum, it has a sleek jet-black finish to match Apple TV's modern style. The ventilated design protects against overheating and Wi-Fi signal loss to ensure a complete user experience.
Most importantly, it can be secured to any flat surface using the bracket's four mounting holes and fits the standard 75mm VESA mount pattern. It is available with an optional security cable. There is no hiding the new Apple TV, so best to display it securely.
Maclocks Apple TV mount is available for pre-order and will be shipping out November 1 st .
